name: parallel-issue-resolution-with-worktrees
description: Resolve multiple GitHub issues simultaneously using parallel sub-agents and git worktrees for conflict-free development

session_context.objective: Resolve 10 GitHub issues from pre-release code quality audit
session_context.outcome: All 10 issues resolved, 9 PRs merged, ~1,335 lines eliminated

best_for: Time-critical batch work (release prep, tech debt sprints)
not_suitable_for: Issues requiring shared state or coordinated changes
Single complex issue requiring sequential reasoning
